import React from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Navbar(props) { const textColor = props.mode === "light" ? "text-dark" : "text-white"; return (
{props.title}
  • Home
  • {props.about}
{props.toggleMode('primary')}}>
{props.toggleMode('primary')}}>
); } Navbar.propTypes = { title: PropTypes.string, about: PropTypes.string, mode: PropTypes.string.isRequired, toggleMode: PropTypes.func.isRequired, setMode: PropTypes.func.isRequired, // Add this line }; Navbar.defaultProps = { title: "TextUtils", about: "About us", };
